author: cdupoirieux
msg: Pdf generation breakdown into several contracts just like the html generation.
If you have customized the common-fo.vt.xml for your project, then take the new one and adapt it to your custo.
- We need to find a way to store the common-fo.vt.xml into fo directory...
- We need to use <page>.body.xml instead of <page>.source.rewritten.xml in the content-main contract
- We should add configuration capabilities (such as change the numbering format in the toc)

author: evenisse
msg: [SCM-287] Support for checking out from a tag and auto-creation of config specs

author: chirino
msg: Added test case that makes use of producer window flow control.  So now even async sends can be flow controled so that an individual publisher can be stopped without stopping the entire connection.
